Add Quotation Mark to a String

Utility to facilitate the construction of JScascade.

quo(string)

equo(x)

Arguments

string
x
It will be subsitituted and deparsed as a string. Then equo will call quo on it returning a string with additional quotation marks.

Value

Examples

identical(
    quo("white"),
    equo(white)
)
q <- quo("hell('world')")
cat(q)
if (requireNamespace("jsonlite"))
    jsonlite::toJSON(q)

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Examples
